summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated July 26, 2019. It records the official inmate count and includes a roster entry for inmate Jeffrey Epstein, who was in the hospital unit at the time.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 78359-053, assigned to the hospital (HOSP) unit on July 26, 2019.

persons.name: Tisdale
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 78359-053, which is the same number as Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting a possible data entry or formatting anomaly.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count was conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with a total of 767 inmates counted and verified.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated July 26, 2019, which is the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death on July 27, 2019.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed with registration number 78359-053 and was assigned to the hospital (HOSP) unit.
The total inmate count for the facility was 767, with Epstein counted in the H-A (Hospital Area) unit.
The document is a routine Bureau of Prisons administrative record for inmate population tracking.
